# height

**Instance Property**

The requested height of the containing window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var height: NSNumber? { get }
```

## Discussion

The object in this property contains a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGFloat-swift.struct] value. If the webpage didn’t request a specific window height, this property is `nil`.

## Inspecting Window Position and Dimensions

- **allowsResizing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to make the containing window window resizable.
- **width**: The requested width of the containing window.
- **x**: The requested x-coordinate of the containing window.
- **y**: The requested y-coordinate of the containing window.
